title: New: Space Cubs – Why Are You Resisting? (New Version)
body: [Stumbling upon](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/22709-new-space-cubs-why-are-you-resisting-you-know-youre-from-there/) **Space Cubs** before her ‘official launch’, the original tracks put online by Suzanne Bonifacio have since disappeared, and subsequently been replaced by a re-recorded version of _Why Are You Resisting?_. As gorgeously layered as the original, the production is smoother and still centred around the XX-style, bass drum section. Check out Why Are You Resisting below, and keep up with **Space Cubs** on [Facebook](http://www.facebook.com/spacecubs). Also, if you’re in Buffalo (just on the off chance…), check her out supporting **Majical Cloudz** [tonight](https://www.facebook.com/events/519965481390872/?ref=22).
